name: Dynamite's Action News
description:
Help hard-hitting reporter Dynamite Watkins investigate the evil fog threatening Lakewood Plaza in Dynamite's Action News!

THIS JUST IN: EXPLOSIVE MOVES!
Match the correct inputs to unleash awesome moves like Watchdog, Muckraker, Devastating Spin and others. Learn even more complex moves as you dig deeper into the story.

INVESTIGATE LAKEWOOD PLAZA
Based in the world of OK, K.O.! Let's Be Heroes, the game stars characters like K.O., Enid, Rad and Mr. Gar. Explore Lakewood Plaza and interview its citizens in your quest for the truth.

SAVE THE DAY THE ACTION NEWS WAY
Challenge your journalistic integrity with unexpected twists like mystery moves, double inputs, reverse inputs and more. Do you have what it takes to get past all the obstacles and discover the real facts?

Trust your reporting instincts and help Dynamite Watkins blow this story wide open in DYNAMITE'S ACTION NEWS!
